emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of thirteen women standing in line, in Loendi Club for National Achievement Clubs, Inc. annual reception
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 24, 1953, pg. 11, reads: "Crown Mrs. Achievement - Pictured at the gala annual reception given at Loendi Club, Friday night, which honored husbands and friends of the National Achievement Clubs, Inc., were Mrs. Mabel Thomas, who was crowned "Queen" of Camp Achievement; Mrs. Lillian Gould Williams, crowned "Mrs. Achievement of 1953" and Mrs. Dorothy Taliferro, who presented them. Mrs. Alma Illery, founder and National president, crowned the happy pair. - Harris Photo."
